title: FS (prices lowered) - Several graded T206's XMAS pricing, some off backs.

posts.post_title: FS (prices lowered) - Several graded T206's XMAS pricing, some off backs.
posts.post_content:
For Sale (prices lowered) - Several graded T206's with XMAS pricing including a few off backs.  Prices include shipping, please message if interested and thanks for looking.  Note: NC residents add 6.75% to any agreed upon price to cover ST.  

T206 Hooks Wiltse with Cap, Sovereign 460 - SGC 4  SOLD
T206 Sherry Magee SC 150 (Red Tape on Back) - SGC 1  SOLD
T206 Frank Isbell SC 150/25 - SGC 2.5  SOLD
T206 Johnny Kling P350 - SGC 2.5  $125 venmo or zelle  $130 pp gs
T206 Tim Jordan Old Mill - SGC 2.5  $125 venmo or zelle  $130 pp gs
T206 John McGraw Glove at Hip, SC 350-460/42 (a bit tougher to find) - SGC 2  SOLD
T206 Ed Cicotte SC 150/30 $240 venmo or zelle  $250 pp gs
T206 Al Shaw EPDG - PSA 2.5  $220 venmo or zelle  $228 pp gs
T206 Admiral Schlei Batting Tolstoi - PSA 2  SOLD
T206 Rudy Hulswitt Sovereign 350 - PSA 2  $65 venmo or zelle  $67 pp gs
T206 Harry Krausse P350 - PSA 2  $55 venmo or $57 pp gs (pending).

PM sent.
